overview:
Life time entrepreneur and technologist primarily focused on the parks & recreation industry.

I am currently involved with a project that is disruptive to the online world of parks and recreation. Our patented Internet marketing techniques are designed to maximize activity attendance and increase revenue streams for entities promoting recreational & intramural activities.

We have identified a weakness within the parks and recreation industry and have developed a concept that will disrupt the way this industry communicates with its members.

milestones.description: Developed marketplace for recreation management software product.
